justification: The candidate demonstrates leadership experience as an Assistant Manager and Business Development Manager, with responsibilities in managing teams and coordinating project resource allocation.
Relevant experience is strong, with roles in business development and assistant management involving data analysis tools.
No evidence of C++, HTML, or CSS skills, although participation in digital marketing efforts indicates some skills in this area.

requirements.criteria: 3+ years of experience in lead generation or business intelligence
Experience with business intelligence tools such as Power BI, SQL, and Tableau
Proficiency in at least one programming language

input.job_description:
## Lead Generation and Business Intelligence Specialist

Join **Innovate Connections Inc.** as a Lead Generation and Business Intelligence Specialist. You will play a pivotal role in driving business growth by spearheading lead generation initiatives and providing strategic insights through data analytics. We are looking for a highly skilled professional with a strong background in lead generation, data management, and business intelligence.

### Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute lead generation strategies using digital marketing techniques, cold calling, and data scraping tools.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize customer acquisition strategies.
- Utilize CRM systems to manage and analyze client data for lead qualification.
- Create and manage detailed project schedules and work plans, utilizing best practices and standards for project execution.
- Develop financial models and business growth strategies based on data insights.
- Utilize tools such as Power BI, SQL, and Tableau for developing comprehensive data reports and dashboards.

### Desired Skills and Experience:
- Strong programming skills in C++, HTML, and CSS.
- Proficiency in digital marketing, email marketing, and social media platforms.
- Experience in managing large data sets and using BI tools (Power BI, Excel, Tableau).
- Excellent communication skills and ability to develop strong client relationships.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

### Why Innovate Connections Inc.?
- We innovate at the forefront of technology and enable our team members to grow alongside the company.
- We value data-driven decision-making and empower our teams with the right tools to succeed.
- Offering a supportive work environment and opportunities for career advancement.

### How to Apply:
Submit your resume and cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you are interested in joining Innovate Connections Inc.
input.additional_info: Innovate Connections Inc. prefers candidates from recognized universities such as the University of Management & Technology and Lahore School of Economics. We encourage a remote working environment but require physical presence for team-building and strategic sessions twice a quarter. Relocation assistance is available for exceptional candidates. Our comprehensive assessment includes a technical test followed by structured interviews to evaluate both technical and soft skills comprehensively.
minimum_requirements: 3+ years of experience in lead generation or business intelligence
Experience with business intelligence tools such as Power BI, SQL, and Tableau
Proficiency in at least one programming language

details.executive_summary: Abdul Rehman Hasham is a skilled business professional with an MBA from Lahore University of Management Sciences, specializing in operations, sales, and marketing. He has demonstrated expertise in data analysis and project management through his roles in various organizations, including Coca Cola and UNICOM Corporation.

employment_history.details: Critically analyze the past 404 days of operations by using Excel and Power BI and performed Breakdown analysis and identified bottlenecks in the operations which were causing delays of 32150 minutes and proposed a plan to improve operations by 21%.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams and improved the customer service experience by 12%. Capitalized on previous relationships and closed new projects worth 32 million pkr. Used business and technical expertise to demonstrate the usefulness and efficiency of product offerings. Managed account relationships, contract negotiations, sales, pricing, billing and logistics. Using data analysis tools and techniques to create charts and dashboards to track and report progress. Lead planning, strategy, proposal process and bid preparation.

Executed World Bank project by the arrangement of resources locally and internationally by coordinating with China head office and also made contracts and negotiated with Hitachi-ABB power grid, SERGI France & Megger UK (212k USD) for the equipment procurement and service delivery. Nurtured relationship with the suppliers and negotiated best prices for the organization. Liaise with Finance department for the budgeting activities of new projects. Participated in bidding activities of ADB, WB and KE projects and negotiated contract terms.

Forecasted the demand of products for multiple projects which are to be imported from the EU and China by coordinating with clients and vendors to ensure the sustainability of the inventory. Managed the team of 25 persons independently to accomplish multiple projects within an allocated budget of 27.5 million by strategic sourcing and vendor management.
